PTYPE.name: dmi_type
PTYPE.pattern: all(ALL) bios(0) system(1) baseboard(2) chassis(3) processor(4) cache(7) port(8) slot(9) onboard(10) pma(16) memory(17) battery(22)

COMMAND.name: show system dmi
COMMAND.ACTION: options="" if [ "${type}" != "ALL" ]; then if [ -n "${type}" ]; then options="$options -t ${type}" fi fi dmidecode -q $options
